topic.title: EMS Current Medication Section - conformance rules

section.p: Information regarding a patient's current medications

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11397 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.15"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67844-1" EMS current Medications Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10955)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title="EMS Current Medications" which SHOULD equal "EMS Current Medications Section" (CONF:10219)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:10958)
Conforms to Currently On Medication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.75)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:10962)
Conforms to Current Medication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.77)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67844-1" EMS current Medications Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10955)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title="EMS Current Medications" which SHOULD equal "EMS Current Medications Section" (CONF:10219)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:10958)
Conforms to Currently On Medication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.75)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:10962)
Conforms to Current Medication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.77)

body.codeblock: <section> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.15"/> <code code="67844-1" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" displayName="EMS current Medications Narrative NEMSIS"/> <title>EMS Current Medications Section</title> <text/> </section>
